about_the_game:
"Mahjong Solitaire Refresh Ex Panels" is additional content for "Mahjong Solitaire Refresh".

【Content details for "Mahjong Solitaire Refresh Ex Panels"】
  • A new separate set of panels to unlock, made up of only Extreme stages!
  • Contains 80 stages!
  • ★Contains 4 bonus arrangement songs from the classic "Shanghai I"! (Can be obtained upon opening the Ex Panels)

【Before you purchase】
  • "Mahjong Solitaire Refresh Ex Panels" requires the base game "Mahjong Solitaire Refresh" in order to play.
  • In order to play the Ex Panels, you must have over 20% of the Main Panels cleared.
  • "Mahjong Solitaire Refresh Ex Panels" is included in the bundle version of the game. Please take care not to double purchase.
